pages.text: I think we can both agree that there are a ton of mobs in the game! I'm sure you've wanted to bring one home, but it was either too far away, too violent or too big. Well, you can craft a cage and you're able to capture any mob in the game... you just right click and then you got it caged. If you shift-right click, you'll place the mob in the cage, but if you simply just right click, then you'll set it free.
$(italics)For the love of god, don't use a jar to catch them...
